title: Caitlyn Jenner celebrates 70th birthday with kids and Kardashian step-children
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Caitlyn Jenner celebrated turning 70 on Tuesday night.

The transgender star, whose official birthday was October 28, rounded up her nearest and dearest for an intimate dinner party to mark the special day.

Joining the former Olympian for the evening was her daughters Kylie, 22, and 23-year-old Kendall Jenner- from her marriage to Kris Jenner - as well as step children Kim Kardashian , 39, and Kourtney Kardashian, 40.

However, Khloe Kardashian , 35, appeared nowhere to be seen on footage shared by the Kardashian-Jenner clan on social media.

Caitlyn's son Brandon, 38, from her first marriage to Chrystie Jenner was also in attendance but his brother Brody, 36, was also absent alongside siblings Burt Jenner, 41, and Cassandra Marino, 39.

(Image: Instagram)

Also seen at the dinner was Brandon's girlfriend Cayley Stoker and Caitlyn's sweetheart Sophia Hutchens.

The I Am Cait star went all out for the candlelit bash by having a table decorated with pretty floral displays.

The party dined on Japanese cuisine and sipped on wine and fruity cocktails as they documented the evening on Instagram .

Caitlyn appeared full of glee as she was presented with a large white frosted birthday cake that was decorated with a throwback snap of Caitlyn, when she was Bruce Jenner, cuddling Kendall and Kylie Jenner as young children.

(Image: Instagram)

The get together comes after Caitlyn was cruelly used as the butt of a joke on Saturday Night Live.

SNL comedian Michael Che used a joke about Kanye West to take a dig at Caitlyn’s identity during the ‘Weekend Update’ segment.

He said: “At first I thought Kanye was losing his mind… and now I feel like he’s fine, he’s just turning into an old white lady.”

The comedian continued: “I mean, he used to be one of the coolest black dudes on earth.

"Now he’s showing up to events in sweatpants and orthopaedic sneakers, listening to Kenny G and trying to get black people to like Trump. It’s like how long until this guy changes his name to Kathy?”

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

He added: “Now you might think I’m crazy, but about five years ago, there was a fella named Bruce Jenner, and he moved to Calabasas…”

The attempt at humour immediately fell flat with the audience, many of whom groaned loudly and audibly said “noooo”.

(Image: Instagram)

Taking to Twitter , one outraged viewer wrote: “Michael Che just deadnamed and misgendered Caitlyn Jenner on air for a joke. The joke? Implying Kanye West is trans. F**kin hell mate.”

Another tweeted the show directly, saying: “Transphobia isn’t funny”.

description: The transgender star celebrated her monumental birthday with her nearest and dearest but Khloe Kardashian and Brody Jenner were nowhere to be seen
